Question 129) Large better quality light oil reservoirs that produce thinner oil were discovered in the Brazilian coast in a layer called pre-salt, formed 150 million years ago.
The use of this energy resource entails for the environment an imbalance in the cycle of
A) Nitrogen, due to environmental nitrification transforming ammonia into Nitrito.
B) nitrogen, due to the increase of nitrogen compounds in the terrestrial environment.
C) carbon, due to increased carbonates dissolved in the marine environment.
D) carbon, due to the release of carbon chains imprisoned below the sediments.
E) phosphorus, due to the release of accumulated phosphates in the marine environment.
